name: Spades Gold
description:
Enjoy a smooth and beautiful looking game of Spades against challenging computer or human players.

Multiplayer Early Access enabled.
You can finally play against other human players! As this is a new feature there might be hiccups.

• Rules: Normal, Normal with blind, Mirror, Whiz
• High resolution graphics
• Native tablet support
• Achievements & leaderboards
• Customize the look and feel
• The AI doesn't cheat!

Customize the game with house rules like:
• Teams
• Breaking spades
• Starting player
• Bidding
• Moon
• Blind bidding
• Point cards
• Sandbagging
